phrases: All the battles we go through seem like a dream.
I caught your scent, Kagome, and came to see you.
Inuyasha, do not pick a fight.
Shaddup... depending on the way it goes, I will kill'i am!
Every time I see you, you are always so angry and arrogant.
Kagome, do not you get tired with a guy like him?
Inuyasha is just nervous, thinking you will steal Kagome away from him.
If you think he is always like this, you are wrong...
You are really wound up tight, huh?
Tell me where Naraku's castle is?!
If we knew that, we would not be in this bind!
Naraku has a barrier around his castle.
Why do not you let us avenge your comrades' deaths...
and hand over the Sacred Jewel fragments you have in both your legs...
and just go back to your nest!
You seem awfully clumsy in handling your sword.
The Tetsusaiga is still too heavy for him.
Well, it will not become light so quickly.
Sorry, but I have no time to spar with you now.
I will leave Kagome in your care until I kill that Naraku!
Do not you dare lay one finger on her!
Even when he runs away, he is so confident.
Do not get so riled up.
When did I get riled up?!
I am happy that he is jealous...
but he could at least be a little more kind.
Does being with me really tire you out?
Do not worry about what Koga said.
He is worried about what you said, Kagome.
The young leader of the Wolf-Demon Tribe.
You followed my scent before Inuyasha could.
The same smell as that woman Kagura.
the wrath of my comrades who were killed by you.
I will avenge them right here!
but you can be fodder for my new incarnation.
but you could not have timed it better.
I will get revenge for my comrades!
Koga... he will be your opponent.
I will beat the hell out of both of you!
Hurry up and take off his shackles!
For you, he is fine just as he is.
I am afraid he might be faster than I am.
No...but what is this chill in the air?
Do not go off on your own!
You cannot even wield the Tetsusaiga sufficiently!
It is not only Naraku I smell!
I catch the smell of that pesky Koga as well!
I am the one who is going to destroy Naraku!
I will not let Koga get ahead of me!
He is caught up with me!
So you have finally come, Inuyasha.
Koga realized he could not win and ran off.
He is smarter than I thought.
That is another one of Naraku's incarnations.
Juromaru, I will remove your seal.
until he kills every living thing around him.
It is probably just a demon puppet, but...
he just slashed the head of Naraku who is supposed to be an ally.
That is why he was shackled and bridled.
He is taking my blows straight on.
No matter how I look at it...
he is not capable of thinking up sly tricks to fight.
I will just deliver a finishing blow!
but that thing he brought along looked so dumb.
I got a really bad feeling about him.
He is probably being beaten to a pulp by that Juromaru.
we may be out of line about this...
But does not it mean that Kagome who is with Inuyasha is in danger?
Why did not you say so earlier?!
You should have realized it yourself!!
I did not feel the arm sever!
It just sort of separated from Juromaru...
That was not his arm that got cut off!
The fellow's guts tasted pretty good, Juromaru.
I was fast asleep inside Juromaru's belly.
So the bit was to prevent you from coming out!
Even if the opponent was Naraku...
Now then, let us feast on the rest of them, Juromaru.
Just what are you sucking up?
And you think you can defeat us with that speed?
I was more afraid of your sword!
Then just pull over the covers and sleep it off!
You have a hole in your belly!
I am taking this girl's life.
How dare you put Kagome in danger!?
You ran off with your tail between your legs!
But I will thank you for just now!
Was I in danger just now?
So what is that stupid looking demon?
He came out of Juromaru's gut.
The cold I sensed coming from Juromaru...
That Kageromaru is so swift, we cannot keep up.
Just who do you think I am?
There is no one who can outrun these legs.
It seems talk is all you have.
I will twist your head off!
You are not worth your talk.
Is that as fast as you can go?
A stupid demon like that should be an easy prey!
Do not compare me to you!
With his leg injured, there is no way he can win!
I think I will have that girl's liver.
Kageromaru, do not you dare touch Kagome...!
I will eat her bones and all!
Inuyasha... did the sword become light?
He is wielding the Tetsusaiga with one hand.
He got so mad, he forgot how heavy it is.
Yes... but look at your wound, it looks so terrible.
Earlier, he was so focused on protecting Kagome, but now...
I will finish you off, too...
If this fight continues, even Inuyasha cannot hold up.
There is no way of knowing where underground Kageromaru will attack.
If at least Kageromaru can be restrained...
This poison... will not work too long...
but it should force Kageromaru out into the open.
The poison must have slowed him down!
You going to die this time?
I can handle the rest all by myself.
this stupid demon is easy to handle.
I can destroy one of his kind!
I do not sense Kageromaru's presence.
Has he hidden himself in the shadows?
If you do not move, I will kill you, too!
It is too late for you to notice.
You meant to kill me, too, did not you?!
You do not even give a damn...
You just flinging down your sword!
Well, he knew that with your speed, you would get out of the way in time.
He is just a pesky wolf cub!
If you get in the way again, I will really kill you!
Why did you do that, Kagome?!
If you fight any more, what do you think will happen?!
I do not think Koga will back off.
I cannot leave you in the hands of that incompetent dogface.
Whenever you are in danger, I will come to the rescue.
You let Koga get away again!
Do you think I would lose to that scrawny wolf cub?!
Look, let us just treat your injury.
And what is with that attitude of yours?
Trying to make him feel good and flirting with him!
It was so disgusting, I could not watch!
W-why are you looking at me like that?
Now that that is settled, shall we go?
We must tend to your wounds, too, Miroku.
You two have to grow up like them.
Naraku who had killed Kikyo once 50 years ago...
comes again to get rid of her.
Onigumo's heart which beats inside him yearns for Kikyo.
That is what has Naraku so vexed.
there is no way Inuyasha can ignore it.
Why are you embracing her like that?
Next on Inuyasha: Onigumo's Heart Still Beats Within Naraku
